front.title: Requirements for Signaling of (Pre-) Congestion Information in a DiffServ Domain

abstract.t: Precongestion notification (PCN) is a means for protecting quality of service for inelastic traffic admitted to a Diffserv domain. The overall PCN architecture is described in RFC 5559. This memo describes the requirements for the signaling applied within the PCN domain, to carry PCN content from the PCN-egress-node towards either the PCN-ingress-node or towards the centralised decision point.
